name: Blade Mistress
description:
Blade Mistress is an old school retro styled 1990s like game where you become a lovely lady and fight your way in a magical world against creatures who threaten to destroy it.
Travel to unique realms and discover the secrets of what caused this chaos. Take part of a class selection to help and aid others or to become the fighter and need support from others.

Blade mistress is a online multiplayer which is designed to incourage team work and player aid to each other with little to no hand holding it is your job to find out things and what is truely happening in this world.

Create your own personal dungeons with Geomancy, or join other players in their own dungeons, Become a 1 of 6 classes Physical, Magaical, Creative, Beast Master, Generalist, and War Mage. Each class having a unique set of skills design to aid each other.
